vulnerability_description: The remote host is running a mail (SMTP) server on this port.Since SMTP servers are the targets of spammers, it is recommended you disable it if you do not use it.
vulnerability_remediation: Disable this service if you do not use it, or filter incoming traffic to this port.
impact: Unauthorized access to your emails and data leakage,Spam and Phishing,Malware,DoS attacks
